煡字的基本解释

煡
jìn
古同“烬”。

煡字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jìn］
［《廣韻》徐刃切，去震，邪。］
亦作“煡1”。“烬1”的繁体字。
(1)物体燃烧后剩下的东西，灰烬。
(2)指灯花，烛花。
(3)指遗民。
(4)烧毁；化成灰烬。
(5)烧残的；残存的。
(6)柴薪。

煡字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　煡； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页677第24
【篇海】許刃切，音釁。焰餘也。

煡字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
煡字的起名意思

暂无。

Xuan
Basic explanation of words
Xuan
jìn
Ancient with "Jin".
Xuan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jìn］
["Guangyun" Xu blade cuts, to shake, evil. ]
Also known as "煡1". Traditional characters for "Jin 1".
(1) What remains after an object is burned, ashes.
(2) Refers to lanterns and candles.
(3) Refers to the survivors.
(4) Burned; turned into ashes.
(5) Burned; leftover.
(6) Firewood.
Xuan
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Collection] [Fire Word Department] 　煡; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 677 24
[Pianhai] Xu blade cuts, provocative. Yan Yu also.
Xuan
